description:
v1.3.1 -> v1.4.0:
new features
•	added post-hoc interpolation of fiber diameters and locations
•	added “init_slides” property to Sample object representing the nerve geometry before transforms (centering, smoothing, perineurium generation, etc.)
v1.3.1 -> v1.4.0: docs
•	added documentation the new post-hoc analysis script
•	reformatted documentation
v1.3.1 -> v1.4.0: bug fixes
•	fixed SFAP extraction time offset and indexing
•	fixed NEURON file export dutils error
•	fixed model basis recycling naming convention
•	fixed checks for missing thresholds on import
•	fixed “inners_on_off” missing threshold handling
v1.3.1 -> v1.4.0: miscellaneous
•	upgraded environment Python to version 3.11
•	added Mock Morphology Generator warning about area uncertainty
•	added warning for COMSOL version differences
•	refactored Mock Morphology Generator implementation
•	updated linting and typehints
•	added warning for ARM architectures
notes: Research supported by the National Institutes of Health SPARC Program (OT2 OD025340) (75N98022C00018)

title: ASCENT V1.4.0
